explanation: The stage direction 'Il se retire promptement, sort son mouchoir, et y confie l'espérance de la branche ainée des comtes de Catso di Coulo' primarily involves a character exiting, as indicated by 'Il se retire' which translates to 'He withdraws/retreats'. Other actions such as 'sort son mouchoir' (takes out his handkerchief) relate to the exit process rather than indicating a different primary category.
stgdir: Il se retire promptement, sort son mouchoir, et y confie l'espérance de la branche ainée des comtes de Catso di Coulo.
